sections.info: A red, green, and yellow RAM chip.
sections.obtaining: First, get to [[Stylus]], then drop down at the front of the platform. '''RAM Chip''' is located inside of a small hole near the bottom.

wiki_markup:
[[File:Lights Out.png|2000px]]
{{CharacterInfo |name=RAM Chip |character=[[File:RAM Chip.png]] |difficulty=[[File:Terrifying.png|link=]] '''Terrifying''' |area=[[Yoyle Factory/Abandonment|Yoyle Factory]] |hint=look underneath a platform |additionalinfo }} == Info == A red, green, and yellow RAM chip. == Obtaining == '''''The following text will show instructions on how to get this object. If you wish to find it by yourself, avoid opening the text.'''''
First, get to [[Stylus]], then drop down at the front of the platform. '''RAM Chip''' is located inside of a small hole near the bottom.
